statements: SELECT * FROM clothing_inventory;
SELECT item_name, store_location, quantity FROM clothing_inventory WHERE price > 50;
SELECT item_name, price FROM clothing_inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT store_location, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM clothing_inventory GROUP BY store_location;
SELECT item_id, item_name, price * quantity AS total_cost FROM clothing_inventory;
SELECT * FROM clothing_inventory WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY price DESC, item_id
SELECT item_name, store_location FROM clothing_inventory WHERE price < 50.00 ORDER BY store_location, quantity DESC
SELECT item_name, price FROM clothing_inventory WHERE store_location = 'New York' AND quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY price ASC
SELECT * FROM clothing_inventory WHERE item_name LIKE '%shirt%' AND quantity > 0 ORDER BY quantity DESC, price ASC
SELECT item_id, item_name, store_location, quantity * price AS total_value FROM clothing_inventory WHERE price > 100.00 ORDER BY total_value DESC, store_location
SELECT * FROM clothing_items ORDER BY item_id DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM clothing_items WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT item_name, store_location, quantity FROM clothing_items WHERE store_location = 'Main Store';
SELECT * FROM store_locations ORDER BY city ASC;
SELECT location_name, city FROM store_locations WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM clothing_items WHERE store_location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM clothing_items WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT item_name, store_location, quantity FROM clothing_items JOIN store_locations ON clothing_items.store_location = store_locations.location_name WHERE city = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT DISTINCT city FROM store_locations ORDER BY city;
SELECT item_name, store_location, quantity FROM clothing_items WHERE item_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND quantity < 50 ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM clothing_items;
SELECT item_name, category FROM clothing_items WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT store_name, location FROM stores ORDER BY store_name DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity, category FROM clothing_items JOIN inventory ON clothing_items.id = inventory.item_id;
SELECT item_name, category, quantity, store_name FROM clothing_items JOIN inventory ON clothing_items.id = inventory.item_id JOIN stores ON stores.store_id = inventory.store_id WHERE quantity > 5;
SELECT item_name, category, quantity FROM clothing_items;
SELECT * FROM stores WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT item_name, category, quantity FROM clothing_items WHERE category = 'Shoes';
SELECT store_name, location FROM stores WHERE store_id = 1;
SELECT item_name, category, quantity FROM clothing_items ORDER BY category DESC, item_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM clothing_items;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM clothing_items WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT location_name, city, state FROM store_locations ORDER BY state, city;
SELECT item_name, quantity, store_location FROM clothing_items WHERE store_location='Main Street' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity_sold, transaction_date FROM sales_transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM clothing_items WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY item_name ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT s.transaction_date, c.item_name, si.quantity FROM sales_transactions s JOIN clothing_items c ON s.item_id = c.id JOIN store_inventory si ON s.item_id = si.item_id WHERE s.quantity_sold > 20 ORDER BY s.transaction_date DESC;
SELECT sl.city, COUNT(si.item_id) AS total_items FROM store_locations sl LEFT JOIN store_inventory si ON sl.id = si.location_id GROUP BY sl.city HAVING total_items > 50 ORDER BY total_items DESC;

SELECT c.item_name, st.location_name, st.state FROM clothing_items c JOIN store_locations st ON c.store_location = st.location_name WHERE c.quantity > 5 AND st.city = 'New York' AND st.state = 'NY' ORDER BY c.item_name ASC, st.location_name DESC;

SELECT c.item_name, si.quantity AS available_quantity, st.location_name, s.transaction_date FROM clothing_items c JOIN store_inventory si ON c.id = si.item_id JOIN store_locations st ON si.location_id = st.id JOIN sales_transactions s ON c.id = s.item_id ORDER BY s.transaction_date DESC, available_quantity ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM store_locations;
SELECT location_name, location_id FROM store_locations;
SELECT * FROM clothing_items WHERE item_price > 50;
SELECT item_name, item_category FROM clothing_items ORDER BY item_category DESC;
SELECT location_name, total_sales FROM store_locations s JOIN sales_reports r ON s.location_id = r.location_id;
SELECT * FROM store_locations ORDER BY location_id DESC, location_name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT item_name, item_price FROM clothing_items WHERE item_category='Tops' ORDER BY item_price DESC

SELECT item_name, item_price, location_name FROM clothing_items JOIN inventory_levels ON clothing_items.item_id = inventory_levels.item_id JOIN store_locations ON inventory_levels.location_id = store_locations.location_id WHERE inventory_levels.quantity > 0 ORDER BY item_price ASC
SELECT location_name, SUM(total_sales) AS total_sales FROM sales_reports GROUP BY location_id HAVING total_sales > 1000 ORDER BY total_sales DESC

SELECT transaction_id, item_name, quantity_sold, transaction_date FROM sales_transactions JOIN clothing_items ON sales_transactions.item_id = clothing_items.item_id WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
